steps.title: Place it on the counter or another flat surface.
steps.content: Place it on the counter or another flat surface.

steps.title: Pour directly into the baking dish.
steps.content: Pour directly into the baking dish.

steps.title: Aluminum foil or a spare lid will work well.
steps.content: Aluminum foil or a spare lid will work well.

steps.title: Keep baking until all of the liquid is absorbed.
steps.content: Keep baking until all of the liquid is absorbed.

steps.title: The lasagna should be soft and edible.
steps.content: The lasagna should be soft and edible.

steps.title: Feel free to spruce it up with freshly chopped herbs.
steps.content: Feel free to spruce it up with freshly chopped herbs. You can also add an extra sprinkling of freshly grated cheese.
